titles.title: Western Regional Export Licensing Office Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to require the establishment and operation of the western regional export licensing office.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Western Regional Export Licensing Office Act of 1987 - Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to direct the Secretary of Commerce to establish a western regional office with the authority to issue export licenses.
